html:
Fan Favorite

Asakuki Premium Essential Oil Diffuser

Pros
  • Remote-controlled
  • Lasts for over 12 hours
Cons
  • Some reviewers noted short cable

This diffuser has racked up over 61,000 ratings on Amazon, and over 20,000 customers have added it to their carts in the past month alone. The reasons are obvious: it’s notably quiet, comes with a remote, and has multiple control settings, including the color of the light, how long you want the diffuser to stay on, and if you want it to mist intermittently. Additionally, you can use the light function even when you aren’t diffusing any oils, so you don’t have to make space for another lighting situation on your bedside table.

Capacity: 500ml

Amazon rating: 4.4/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “The diffuser itself is fantastic. It has a remote, which is incredibly convenient, and the size is perfect—it lasts up to 18 hours without needing constant refilling. It works immediately upon turning it on, with no need to warm up, and it’s really quite pretty, adding a nice touch to the room’s decor. I bought this diffuser because I have a cold, and the heater has been making the air dry, so the claim about offering healthy humidity is definitely appealing. Time will tell how well that works, but so far, it’s doing its job beautifully.”

Best High-Tech

Pura x Nest Fragrances Bamboo & Grapefruit Smart Home Fragrance Diffuser Set

Pros
  • Lasts for weeks
  • Not too strong
Cons
  • Some have difficulty connecting device to Wi-Fi

Fun fact about me: I used to wear Nest fragrances to bed every night. Something about the perfumery’s blends soothed me right to sleep. Thanks to Pura, you, too, can mist those calming scents into the air before, during, and after bedtime with this plug-in diffuser. You can control the intensity, alternate between fragrances, and set the timer all through an app on your phone.

Capacity: Two fragrances

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I have tried so many scents and applicator machines/plug-ins throughout the years. Nest scents and the Pura plug-in are superior. Currently, grapefruit and bamboo are my go-to scents. They last for over six weeks depending on your settings.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Most Stylish Diffuser

Vitruvi Stone Ultrasonic Aromatherapy Diffuser

Pros
  • Ceramic material
  • Two time settings
Cons
  • Scent may not be strong enough for some

Vitruvi’s option prioritizes form and function and will fit right in among your other ceramic pieces. The brand thought of everything; when the oil diffuser runs out of water, it will automatically shut off, and it comes with a lifetime warranty. The chic device also comes in black, gray, and light brown (did someone say Mocha Mousse?).

Capacity: 90ml

Amazon rating: 4/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “This is nice quality, and I love that it’s ceramic. It goes with all my other vases and things. This looks so nice and expensive and works wonderfully. It makes my house smell amazing, and it travels from room to room. I love this so much, and I’m so happy I bought it. I highly highly recommend this, and I would absolutely repurchase it.”

Best Humidifying Diffuser

Urpower 2nd Generation Aroma Essential Oil Diffuser

Pros
  • Quiet
  • Cord on the longer side
Cons
  • Some find it difficult to put the lid back on

This diffuser-humidifier combo holds an impressive amount of water, which means it can last hours without needing a refill. The material is also easy to wipe down and clean, which is important, as diffusers should be cleaned frequently to prevent bacteria and mold growth.

Capacity: 300ml

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “So far, this lives up to its reputation. Even though it is inexpensive, it works flawlessly. I recommend.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Plug-In

Atmos Diffuser

Pros
  • Connects to phone via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi
  • Can blend multiple fragrances
Cons
  • Only compatible with Atmos fragrances

Atmos’ diffuser holds up to three of the brand’s fragrances. Using an app, you can switch between them and even combine two (or all three) of them to create your own bespoke home scent. The fragrances themselves aren’t one-note, either—some notable ones include Comfort, a blend of banana bread, cinnamon, and vanilla, and Bouquet, a cocktail of honeysuckle, rose, lavender, and sandalwood.

Capacity: Three fragrances

An Atmos reviewer says: “I’ve already gotten tons of compliments about how my home smells. It’s pretty much the first thing people mention when they come over.”

Best Budget-Friendly

Equsupro Essential Oil Diffuser Aromatherapy Diffuser

Pros
  • Works as a night light
  • Four timer settings
Cons
  • Does not work without water

Two to three drops of oil and about five ounces of water are all you need to perfume your home or office for hours. Depending on your mood, you can switch between seven different LED light colors.

Capacity: 150ml

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “I recently purchased this diffuser with built-in lights, and I am absolutely thrilled with it! Not only does it fill my space with a soothing, aromatic mist, but the lights create an atmosphere that's nothing short of magical. The changing colors are vibrant yet calming, offering a soft, ambient glow that’s perfect for relaxation or setting the mood in any room. The diffuser operates quietly, and the mist lasts for hours, ensuring long-lasting comfort throughout the day or night. Whether I’m unwinding with a book or enhancing the ambiance for a cozy evening, this diffuser has become an essential part of my daily routine. Its sleek design fits beautifully into any decor, and I love the option to customize the light settings. Overall, this is a must-have for anyone who enjoys a peaceful and inviting environment.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Waterless Diffuser

Saje Aroma Oasis

Pros
  • No spill risk
  • Easily portable
Cons
  • Only accommodates one oil at a time

If you’re traveling and want to take a diffuser with you, Saje’s waterless diffuser is probably your best bet. That way, you can indulge in aromatherapy wherever you are without accidentally leaking water in your carry-on or lugging around an oversized device.

Capacity: One fragrance

Saje rating: 5/5 stars

Amazon Bestseller

Bzseed Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser Humidifier

Pros
  • Seven light settings
  • Can go a long time between refills
Cons
  • Scent may not be intense enough for some

This diffuser acts like a humidifier, helping combat dry air that can make breathing hard in the colder months. Plus, it’s a real looker with its unique shape and faux wood exterior.

Capacity: 550ml

Amazon rating: 4.3/5 stars

An Amazon reviewer says: “This has me burning fewer candles and keeping my house smelling better longer! It's all-natural and lasts all night long.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

How long should I leave my diffuser on?

It all depends on the oil, the diffuser, and the size of your room, so pay close attention to the diffuser’s directions. However, you should always ensure that the room you’re using it in is well-ventilated, as breathing in too much of the oils at once can be detrimental to the lungs.

Are oil diffusers safe for pets?

As a general rule, pet owners should avoid diffusing essential oils in their homes, as certain oils can even be toxic for certain animals. Consult your veterinarian for more information regarding your specific pets.
